channel.title: 030_setup_prerequisites on KCD Cloud Native

item.title: 4. Install GWSL
item.description: Install GWSL GWSL is an XServer that lets you easily run graphical Linux apps on Windows 10. GWSL stands for Graphical WSL. ➡️ Download and Install GWSL Github Source ➡️ Setup Remote Display export DISPLAY=$(ip -4 route | awk '{ if ($1~/default/) print $3 }'):0.0 export PULSE_SERVER=tcp:$(ip -4 route | awk '{ if ($1~/default/) print $3 }') ➡️ Update profile to persist the configuration echo "export DISPLAY=\$(ip -4 route | awk '{ if (\$1~/default/) print \$3 }'):0.
